original_text: If you ever forget the Lord your God and follow other gods and worship and bow down to them, I testify against you today that you will surely be destroyed.
korean_text: 네가 만일 네 하나님 여호와를 잊어버리고 다른 신들을 따라 그들을 섬기며 그들에게 절하면 내가 너희에게 증거하노니 너희가 반드시 멸망할 것이라

sentences.original_text: If you ever forget the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 주 너희 하나님을 잊어버리면

sentences.original_text: and worship and bow down to them
that you will surely be destroyed
